ygData.subject: Re: Prices on patchwork
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I sell patchwork at 1 gold per AC point value of the armour piece. That is a little cheaper than what a merchant charges when he/she happens to have a
ygData.messageBody:
Chade wrote:

> Kinowa wrote:
>
> > What is everyone selling banded for (compiling list)
>
> On that note, what is everyone selling patchwork for as well? General
> pricing info so we all know what to charge. ;)
>
> Chade

I sell patchwork at 1 gold per AC point value of the armour piece.
That is a little cheaper than what a merchant charges when
he/she happens to have a piece and less than double the amount that the
same merchant offers for the piece so I don't think I'm too greedy.

Why?
* It isn't normally sold by merchants.
* Even when it is it's cheaper per AC point than cloth but offers better
protection.
* Leather is usually only 1 AC point better than patchwork but costs at least 4
gold per AC point...

You may even think my prices are too cheap? Are they?

Let's not give away our products.
